title: Create a Newsletter Edition
description: A newsletter editor needs to curate the top stories of the week and write a daily newsletter to be sent to subscribers.

tasks.description: Review the week's published articles and select the 5 most important or popular stories.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent curates a list of top stories.

tasks.description: For each selected story, write a short, engaging summary to entice readers to click.
Assemble the newsletter in the email marketing platform, adding the summaries, links, and a brief introduction.
tasks.expected_outcome: The newsletter is built and ready to be sent.
